Thanks Misty =) 

Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:            Wow Rhonda that is good news. I had no idea you had such a BIG weight on your shoulders! I am glad to hear things are going your way and they are helping you with the problem.
   
  Misty

Rhonda W <rhondak1973@...> wrote:
        
Im not getting evicted! I got an email from a lady in the main HUD office here in Arizona....she made some calls and the manager here at my complex got in trouble for all the stuff she's been doing to me(major harrassment ever since I got HUD involved a few years back)...and I get to stay!  Thank God cuz I had no where to go cept my mini van...so big weight off the ole shoulders!
   
  Hope everyone had a good Monday!
  Rhonda
